title: UDIN Portal Gets a Makeover: ICAI Introduces Enhanced User-Friendly Features
content:
# UDIN Portal Gets a Makeover: ICAI Introduces Enhanced User-Friendly Features

Ek important update hai! ICAI ne Unique Document Identification Number (UDIN) Portal ko aur behtar banane ke liye user-friendly features announce kiye hain. Yeh changes Chartered Accountants (CAs) ke liye ease of use badhayenge aur compliance process ko streamline karenge.

**Key Enhancements:**

*   **Single Sign-On (SSO) Integration:** Ab members apne ICAI Self Service Portal (SSP) credentials se seamlessly login kar sakte hain. First-time registration ki requirement ab abolish ho gayi hai, making it more convenient and secure.
*   **Enhanced Dashboard and Analytics:** Naye Member Dashboard par graphical insights milenge, jaise year-wise aur category-wise UDIN generation ke bar graphs aur pie charts. Isse members apni UDIN activity ko efficiently monitor kar payenge.
*   **Expanded UDIN Generation Capabilities:** UDINs ab teen major categories mein generate kiye ja sakte hain: Certificates; GST & Tax Audit; aur Audit & Assurance Functions. Document content ke hisab se dynamic input fields bhi introduce kiye gaye hain.
*   **Additional Compliance Parameters:** GST aur Tax Audit reports ke liye assessee/auditee ka mandatory PAN capture karna hoga, solely for validation at the e-filing portal. Auditor's Opinion on Financial Statements aur Preceding Year's Audit Details bhi introduce kiye gaye hain. Statutory Bank Branch Audits ke liye Memorandum of Changes (MoC) ka encrypted disclosure bhi mandatory hai.
*   **Bulk UDIN Generation Facility:** High-volume certifications ke liye, members ab category-specific templates use karke ek saath 300 UDINs tak generate kar sakte hain.
*   **Improved UDIN Management:** 'List UDIN' module mein advanced filtering, searching, downloading (CSV/PDF), printing aur revocation options hain, for better record management within the prescribed time frame.
*   **Robust Grievance Redressal Mechanism:** Members aur external users ab attachments ke saath grievances lodge kar sakte hain, status track kar sakte hain, aur zarurat padne par cases reopen bhi kar sakte hain, ensuring transparency and timely resolution.

Yeh enhancements ICAI ke UDIN Portal ko DigiCA Platform par migrate karne ke wider initiative ka part hain, jiska announcement December 10, 2025, ko kiya gaya tha. Isse members ko ek smoother aur more efficient experience milega.
